text: Takeshi Nagano (永野健 Nagano Takeshi, born July 11, 1985) is a Japanese volleyball player who plays for Panasonic Panthers. ==Clubs== * Sasebo South High School * University of Tsukuba * Panasonic Panthers (2008-) ==Awards== ===Individuals=== * 2007-08 Men's V.Premier League – "Best Libero" * 2008: 57th Kurowashi Tournament – "Best Libero" * 2009-10 Men's V.Premier League – "Best Libero" * 2010: 59th Kurowashi Tournament – "Best Libero" * 2010-11 Men's V.Premier League – "Best Libero" and "Best Receiver" * 2011-12 Men's V.Premier League – "Best Libero" and "Best Receiver" * 2012-13 Men's V.Premier League – "Best Libero" and "Best Receiver" * 2013: 62nd Kurowashi Tournament – "Best Libero" * 2014: 63rd Kurowashi Tournament – "Best Libero" ===Team=== * 2008 Kurowashiki All Japan Volleyball Championship – 16px Champion, with Panasonic Panthers. * 2008-09 V.Premier League – 16px Bronze Medal 3rd place, with Panasonic Panthers. * 2009 Kurowashiki All Japan Volleyball Championship – 16px Champion, with Panasonic Panthers. * 2009-10 V.Premier League – 16px Champion, with Panasonic Panthers. * 2010 Kurowashiki All Japan Volleyball Championship – 16px Champion, with Panasonic Panthers. * 2010 Asian Club Championship – Bronze Medal 3rd place, with Panasonic Panthers. * 2010-11 V.Premier League – 4th place, with Panasonic Panthers. * 2011-12 V.Premier League – 16px Champion, with Panasonic Panthers. * 2012 Kurowashiki All Japan Volleyball Championship – 16px Champion, with Panasonic Panthers. * 2012-13 V.Premier League – 16px Runner-Up, with Panasonic Panthers. * 2013 Kurowashiki All Japan Volleyball Championship – 16px Runner-Up, with Panasonic Panthers. * 2013-14 V.Premier League – 16px Runner-Up, with Panasonic Panthers. * 2014 Kurowashiki All Japan Volleyball Championship – 16px Champion, with Panasonic Panthers. ==National team== ===Senior Team=== * 2009 Asian Championship – Gold Medal Gold Medal * 2010 World Championship – 13th place * 2010 Asian Games – Gold Medal Gold Medal * 2011 World Cup – 10th place * 2011 Asian Championship – 5th place * 2013 World Grand Champions Cup – 6th place * 2013 World League – 18th place * 2013 Asian Championship – 4th place * 2014 World League – 19th place * 2014 Asian Games – Silver Medal Silver Medal ==References== ==External links== * official profile * Panasonic Panthers Player Profiles title: Takeshi Nagano
